channel.description: Recent content in cryptocurrency on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-27
item.description: Reddit tests allowing users to set any NFT as their profile picture, similar to Twitter (3 minute read) Reddit is testing a feature, similar to one recently launched on Twitter, that will let users set any NFT they own as a profile picture.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: ‘Wen Token?’: Polymarket’s New Airdrop Futures Market Has Answers (3 minute read) Polymarket has launched Airdrop Futures, a new market where speculators can bet on whether projects will airdrop tokens.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: US Banks Form Group to Offer USDF Stablecoin (2 minute read) A group of institutions backed by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.
